rpc.design
Class Design

java.lang.Object
  rpc.design.Design

public class Design
extends java.lang.Object

A design object consists of the unit to test for dependence and the set of design elements that will control for various aspects of potential confounders.

Field Summary
 Unit unit
           
 
Constructor Summary
Design(Unit u)
          Instantiate a design based on its underlying unit and model support data structure.

equals

public boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)
Compares this design to the specified object. The result is true if and only if the designs have the same underlying unit and design elements.
